ProjectTitle: From One Election to the Next. A Panel Study on the Cognitive, Attitudinal, and Behavioural Effects of Repeated Elections in Belgium.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
01/07/2024
Data: can you give a bit more detail about the datasets that you will generate, are these surveys, interviews, election results? How are these collected, e.g. electronic or paper forms, interview recordings, datasets received from the government or publicly available? Will you generate derived datasets or do you write code for analysis? The volume is very small, is this for the complete dataset or per participant? 
Ethics: your approval number is incomplete, is this G2024-7854?
Sharing: please note that your data will get a DOI upon deposit in RDR. Is the dataset fully anonymous? Otherwise you can apply access restrictions in RDR.
label: good with suggestions
